data.title: Clan Corporate by Charles Stross, First Edition
data.meta_description: The Clan Corporate by Stross, Charles and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.co.uk.
data.text:
Softback. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: No dustjacket. First. First UK edition mass market paperback with a full 1 to 9 number sequence indicating a first printing of this edition. Reading creases to spine and to bottom edge of rear cover and some rubbing to covers. Some tanning to pages. Book Three of The Merchant Princes. SYNOPSIS: "A young business journalist from Boston, Miriam discovered that her family comes from a parallel timeline, that she is very well connected and that her family is way too much like the Mafia for her comfort. She's tried hard to remain her own woman, even going so far as to start a profitable and legitimate business in a third timeline she has discovered beyond her family's reach." IN STOCK FOR IMMEDIATE DESPATCH.

Hardcover first edition - First printing. In the first two books in this series, "Miriam Beckstein has gotten in touch with her roots and they have nearly strangled her. A young, hip, business journalist in Boston, she discovered that her family comes from an alternate reality, that she is very well-connected, and that her family is a lot too much like the mafia for comfort. In addition women are family property and are required to breed more family members." Now she is trying to start a business outside the family's reach. 320 pp. Very near fine in a like dustjacket (crease to front flap of dj).

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Near Fine. Paul Youll, dj art. (illustrator). 1st Edition 1st Printing. Tor Books, 2006. 1st Edition 1st Printing. Hardcover. Very Good/Near Fine. 8vo - over 7Â¾ - 9Â¾" tall. Paul Youll, dj art. The book has slight soiling to the edges of the page block. The dust jacket is unclipped ($24.95). 0 9 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 number line. Signed by the author on the title page.

Hardcover. Condition: As New. Dust Jacket Condition: As New. 1st Edition. First US Edition, First Printing. This is a true first edition, first printing (first impression) with a full numberline starting with 1 to the copyright page and the statement [First Edition May 2006] as called for to indicate a true first print in a New Dust Jacket. Third book in The Merchant Prince series. SIGNED and Dated by Charles Stross to the title page. [Charles Stross Edinburgh 20 - July - 2007]. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good+. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good+. 1st Edition. First edition, hardcover, signed by Stross on the title page, the book has a shallow skew to the binding, moderate bumps to the spine ends with lighter wear to the cover corners, and a hint of smudging to the edges of the text block. Otherwise, this is a solid, tight Very Good+ copy in a like, unclipped dust jacket, which has light bumps to the spine ends and corners, mild rubbing, and a touch of edge wear. The jacket is wrapped in Mylar.

Stross, Charles. The Merchant Princes: Books 2, 3, 4, 5 : The hidden family, The Clan Corporate, The Merchants' War, The Revolution Business. New York: Tor, 2005-2009, 2005, stated First Edition, 303, 320, 336, 320pp., very good dust-jacket with original prices on each volume, slightest small tear on lower corner of book three, wear along rear top edge of book five, four volumes, very good colorful hardcover volumes, slight bruise to corner of book two, previous owner's bookplate in two of the volumes. BOOK FIVE: Revolution Business: SIGNED simply Charles Stross on title page. Four of five volumes in the series: LACKING FIRST VOLUME. - Last volume, book five, is SIGNED, others are NOT signed. Each volume is stated First Edition, with complete first printing number line on copyright page counting down and ending with a 1. - Hidden Family, ISBN 9780765313478 - The Clan Corporate, ISBN 9780765309303 - The Merchants' War, ISBN 9780765316714 - The Revolution Business, ISBN 9780765316721.
